Package core

Class Driver

java.lang.Object
core.Driver
public class Driver extends Object
The Driver class provides methods for UI element search and manipulation using UIAutomation and Sikuli. It is responsible for managing the search context, scope, and search attempts. The class also includes utility methods to find Pane and Window elements.

      public UIElement getUIElement​(mmarquee.automation.Element element) throws NullPointerException, mmarquee.automation.AutomationException
      Returns a UIElement for the given Element.
      Parameters:
      element - The Element for which to get the UIElement.
      Returns:
      The UIElement representing the given Element.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the provided Element is null.
      mmarquee.automation.AutomationException - If an error occurs during UIElement creation.

    • findElement

      public mmarquee.automation.Element findElement​(LocatorType locatorType, mmarquee.automation.ControlType controlType, String value) throws NullPointerException, mmarquee.automation.AutomationException
      Finds an element with the given locator and value.
      Parameters:
      locatorType - The type of locator to use for finding the element.
      controlType - The ControlType of the element to find.
      value - The value to search for in the element's properties.
      Returns:
      The Element representing the found element.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the provided locatorType, controlType, or value is null.
      mmarquee.automation.AutomationException - If an error occurs during element search.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided locatorType is not supported.

    • findElements

      public List<mmarquee.automation.Element> findElements​(LocatorType locatorType, mmarquee.automation.ControlType controlType, String value) throws NullPointerException, mmarquee.automation.AutomationException
      Finds elements with the given locator and value.
      Parameters:
      locatorType - The type of locator to use for finding the elements.
      controlType - The ControlType of the elements to find.
      value - The value to search for in the elements' properties.
      Returns:
      The list of Elements representing the found elements.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the provided locatorType, controlType, or value is null.
      mmarquee.automation.AutomationException - If an error occurs during element search.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided locatorType is not supported.

    • findSikuliElement

      public SikuliElement findSikuliElement​(LocatorType locatorType, String parameter1, String parameter2) throws org.sikuli.script.FindFailed, IllegalArgumentException
      Finds a SikuliElement based on the given locator type and parameters.
      Parameters:
      locatorType - The type of locator to use for finding the SikuliElement.
      parameter1 - The first parameter for the locator (e.g., image path, x-coordinate).
      parameter2 - The second parameter for the locator (e.g., y-coordinate, OCR text).
      Returns:
      The found SikuliElement.
      Throws:
      org.sikuli.script.FindFailed - If the SikuliElement is not found or if there is an error during the search.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided locatorType is not supported.
